body:
I know this might sound a bit spammy.. But i got another video up :P. Its the first commentary video i have done.. I just derp around in nexus trying desperately to get hits :P. Again i cant edit videos just yet. I have talked with my parents and they agreed to buy "After effects" On christmas. For now enjoy my commentary, Thats pretty much the only way I THINK i stand out :P
 
Yes you can hear my CPU cooler.. I will edit that out when i get After effects :P And just to say, The audio was a bit high.. So i recommend you reduce your volume :P


Enyoy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m5gRPynq2r8&list=UUuVTo8wU_p706eNwNT5TIVA
If you can please leave feedback! :D
